artworks.title: Tide Echo
artworks.description: Soft waves and dense horizons, built in layered glaze.

artworks.description: A calm geometry of pale quartz and balanced light.

artworks.title: Quiet Voltage

artworks.title: Drift Index
artworks.description: Graphite tracks and drifting lines, cataloged as a study.
